Name: Diamond Caves
About the game: The main goal in Diamond Caves is to get out of a cave by collecting enough Emeralds and Diamonds for the exit to open. This can be quite tricky because you are not alone in the cave, there are a few different enemies as well as special items such as doors, keys, acid pools, teleporters, bombs & dynamite and much more... The game features: classic 16bit graphics and sound full mouse/keyboard or controller support single player and split-screen co-op Several groups of Levels of various difficulty: 200 single player levels and 100 teamwork levels each Level with its own Highscore-Leaderboard unlock bonus Levels and Steam achievements Level Editor included Steam Workshop support: download user generated levels
